input.sentences: my grandpa and i are taking a rest from all the excitement at his job .
my grandparents and i decided to take a picture of our exciting day .
my dad had to work so he could not join us at the museum .
i am playing on the peg board by making imprints of my hands .
my grandpa and i are trying to find different looking rocks for my collection .
output.sentences: IT IS A FATHER AND CHILD
